title: We have restored this installation to an older version  ...... Repeat over and over again
body:
1 - We have restored this installation to an older version of league of legends. Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version.

Then after clicking ''OKAY'' button it say  '' There was a problem patching league of legends. We'll restore a backup version and try updating again after you restart the patcher '' Then you click restart and it take you back to point number 1.

Over and over again

replies.body: im having the same issue.  tried running the Hextech Repair Tool, it keeps crashing on the Configuring DNS portion.  tried logging in after that and i get the first message, click okay, and am able to login and sometimes click on a few things before the second message pops up, so im still stuck in the loop.  seems to me that there is something making the client think it isn't patched and displaying these messages, when really there's nothing wrong (aside from of course these annoying messages popping up and destroying all functionality of the client...)

found a solution on another board post that worked for me.  set your clock and date back a day or two (time and day).  i still got the first message when logging in but then everything seems fine.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/k7xmElhu-we-have-restored-this-installation-to-an-older-version-of-league-of-legends?comment=0008000300040000000200000000

Good news, this should now be resolved!  If you're still running into problems with this, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can help individually.
